Title: Halloween III
Writer: Daniel J. Goor (created by), Michael Schur (created by), David Phillips, Matt O'Brien (executive story editor), Lakshmi Sundaram (executive story editor), Phil Augusta Jackson (story editor), Tricia McAlpin (story editor), Justin Noble (story editor), David Phillips (story editor)
Actors: Andy Samberg, Stephanie Beatriz, Terry Crews, Melissa Fumero
Plot: For this year's Halloween challenge, Jake and Holt divide the precinct into teams as they try to see who can steal a crown held under lock and key in the interrogation room.
